0 : Add new Item

22:01:39.2901222	Name1	Desc1	1
22:01:39.2921082	Name2	Desc2	2
------------ ----------

0 : Add new Item
1 : Show all items
2 : Edit item
3 : Delete item

------------ --------------

------------ ----------
"

testcase.name: whenFindByName

failure.message:
Expected: is "Menu:
0 : Add new Item
1 : Show all items
2 : Edit item
3 : Delete item
4 : Find item by Id
5 : Find items by name
------- ------
id					name	desc	created
22:01:39.3392856	Name1	Desc1	1
22:01:39.3405663	Name2	Desc2	2
------- -------------
" but: was "Menu:
0 : Add new Item
1 : Show all items
2 : Edit item
3 : Delete item
4 : Find item by Id
5 : Find items by name
------- ------
------- -------------
